author: Lydgate, John, 1370?-1451?
Boccaccio, Giovanni, 1313-1375. De casibus virorum illustrium. aut
publisher: In Flete strete at the sygne of the sonne by Wykyn de Worde,
notes: Consists largely of extracts from STC 3175: Boccaccio, Giovanni.  De casibus illustrium virorum.
Place of publication and printer's name from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Colophon: Here endeth the prouerbes of Lydgate vpon the fall of prynces.
Reproduction of the original in the Pierpont Morgan Library, New York City.
keywords: Kings and rulers --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
